title: Minecraft Classic C Rewrite
desc: A project to recreate Minecraft Classic versions from scratch in pure C.

title: Minecraft Pre-Classic C Rewrite
desc: A project to recreate Minecraft Preclassic (RubyDung) versions from scratch in pure C.

title: Exoplanet Rocket SF-2
desc: My team's second solid fuel rocket project. Like SF-1 but with a payload that deploys at 120 meters after apogee. Aiming for more complexity and reliability.

title: Exoplanet Rocket SF-1
desc: My team's first solid fuel rocket. It had to save itself by releasing a parachute after apogee and send telemetry data to a custom ground station.

title: Exoplanet Dashboard
desc: A dashboard written in C# to display rocket telemetry data like altitude and speed in live graphs. Helps analyze rocket flights in real time.

title: Exoplanet Rocket Electronics
desc: Code and hardware for Exoplanet’s rocket systems, including the rocket’s onboard controller and the ground receiver station for telemetry.

title: Teaching Appointment Bot
desc: A Telegram bot I built commercially for online teaching. Students can schedule lessons and choose how much time they need. Teachers get an admin panel to manage their availability and bookings.

title: LED Matrix Magic
desc: A 16x16 LED matrix controller using an ESP8266 and WS2812B LEDs. Controlled through a web interface for real-time drawing and custom light shows.

title: Bryce3D Source Restoration
desc: A private project where I’m reverse engineering and trying to restore the old Bryce3D 3.1 source code from 1997. It’s part software archaeology and part nostalgia.

title: ShellSaga
desc: A web-based text adventure styled like a terminal session where you play through a story and learn Bash commands along the way.

title: Hammer Units Conversion Tool
desc: A Rust desktop app with a simple GUI to convert real-world measurements to Valve Hammer units and back. Useful for making maps for Source engine games.

title: Pop or Fail
desc: A small game written in pure C for the 20 Second Game Jam. The goal is to pop balloons as fast as you can before the timer runs out.

title: Hungry Pumpkin Godot Remake
desc: A complete remake of the classic Hungry Pumpkin game in Godot. Fully open source and available on itch.io. Same vibes as the original but cleaner.

title: MouseMoverLib-C
desc: A small C library for moving the mouse automatically on X11 systems. Useful for keeping your session awake or automating UI tests.
